home.ecofriendlyDesc: We use only natural and eco-friendly materials to minimize our impact on the environment
home.fastDeliveryDesc: All orders are processed within 24 hours and delivered by trusted courier services

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn about the history and values of Lutkowo
about.storyText: Lutkowo was born from a passion for craftsmanship and the belief that handmade objects have a soul that mass production lacks. We started as a small workshop and now collaborate with many talented artisans from all over Poland.
about.missionText: Our mission is to support local artisans and promote traditional crafting techniques while caring for the environment and sustainable development.
about.qualityText: We ensure the highest quality of every product that enters our store.
about.sustainabilityText: We use environmentally friendly materials and minimize our impact on the planet.
about.communityText: We support local artisans and build a community of people sharing our passion for crafts.

admin.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this product?

shipping.title: Shipping Information
shipping.standardDeliveryInfo: We offer various delivery options including courier delivery, parcel lockers, and in-store pickup.
shipping.deliveryTimeInfo: Standard order processing time is 1-3 business days. After this period, the order is handed over to the selected courier company.
shipping.returnsInfo: Customers have the right to return purchased products within 14 days of receiving the shipment. Detailed information about the return and complaint process can be found in the Terms and Conditions.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introText: This Privacy Policy sets out the principles for processing and protecting the personal data of Users using the Lutkowo online store.
privacy.dataCollectionText: We collect only the data necessary to process orders, such as name, surname, delivery address, email address and phone number.
privacy.cookiesText: Our store uses cookies to provide the highest quality of service, adapt content to user preferences, and analyze website traffic.
privacy.thirdPartyText: Personal data may be shared with third parties only for the purpose of order fulfillment (courier companies, payment operators) or when required by law.
privacy.rightsText: You have the right to access your data, rectify it, delete it, restrict processing, and the right to data portability.
privacy.contactText: If you have questions about the processing of personal data, please contact us at our email address contact[at]lutkowo.pl

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.introText: These Terms and Conditions define the rules for using the Lutkowo online store, the conditions for concluding sales agreements, and the rules for product delivery and complaints.
terms.definitionsText: Store: Lutkowo online store; Customer: a natural person, legal person or organizational unit making purchases in the Store; Order: a declaration of the Customer's will expressing the direct will to conclude a sales agreement.
terms.orderProcessText: Orders in the Lutkowo store can be placed 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Order confirmation is provided via email sent to the address provided by the Customer.
terms.paymentText: The store offers various forms of payment, including online payments, traditional bank transfers, and cash on delivery. Payment details are presented during the ordering process.
terms.deliveryText: Products are delivered via courier companies, parcel lockers, or through in-store pickup. Delivery time depends on the selected delivery option.
terms.returnsText: The customer has the right to withdraw from the contract within 14 days from the date of receiving the shipment without giving a reason. Complaints can be submitted electronically or in writing.
terms.liabilityText: The store is not responsible for damages resulting from improper use of products by the Customer. Products should be used in accordance with their intended purpose and the enclosed instructions.
terms.contactText: If you have questions about the Terms and Conditions, please contact us at our email address contact[at]lutkowo.pl or by phone at +48 123 456 789.
